Surflare has offered stable service for 8+ years since 2016, with advanced data encapsulation and traffic control technology , delivering fast speeds and great reliability.

• Amazingly Fast
Surflare VPN delivers amazingly fast speeds with powerful data encapsulation and traffic control technology, supported by its global infrastructure and high-quality network, ensuring smooth, lag-free connections every time.

• Smart Routing
Users can easily manage app traffic—route through VPN, connect directly to the internet, or block it entirely.

• Multi-hop VPN
Surflare supports multi-hop VPN functionality, enhancing both speed and latency for a smoother online experience.

•Works on every platform
Available on iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, and as a browser extension for complete cross-platform functionality.

• Surflare Router
The Surflare WiFi6 router comes with firmware fully developed by Surflare for seamless VPN integration and performance.

• No logs kept
Surflare does not and will never log traffic data, DNS queries, or any information that could be used to identify you.

• Unlimited Traffic
Connect up to 8 devices with unlimited traffic and enjoy access to servers in 40+ countries worldwide for an uninterrupted experience.

• 24/7 Support
Real humans are available 24/7 via live chat to assist you with setup and troubleshooting.
